description.value:
Activate 1 Interact

A fury cocktail is a fortifying ginger beer spiked with rum and a mixer. It's rumored to have originated from a barbarian-themed festival in a popular mead hall specializing in alchemical beverages.

Benefit You gain a +2 item bonus to melee attack rolls and an additional effect depending on the additive chosen when the brew is created. The effects lasts 10 minutes.

  • Animalistic Lemon juice and powdered claws or talons are added to the cocktail. You gain an unarmed attack in the brawling group of your choice between a jaws attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage or a claw attack that has the agile trait and deals 1d4 slashing damage.
  • Double This cocktail is just stronger, with more ginger and more rum. You gain resistance 1 to physical damage.
  • Mournful A few flower petals add a powerful aroma to the drink. You gain resistance 1 to void damage, or resistance 1 to vitality damage if you have void healing.
  • Skeptical A splash of bitters gives the drink a more complex flavor. You gain a +1 item bonus to saves against magic.
  • Titanic Yuzu juice and powdered giant hair are added to this cocktail. If you're Medium or smaller, you gain the following effects: you become Large, are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}, and increase your reach by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny).
  • Wyrmhide Pomegranate juice and elemental reagents are added to the cocktail. You gain resistance 1 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and poison damage.

Drawback You take a –1 penalty to AC and a –2 penalty to Reflex saves.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Fury Cocktail (Lesser)]
